questions.question: How do I create my first health event?
questions.answer: To create your first health event, tap the journal button on the home screen and select your current stress level. Add any notes about what you're experiencing.

questions.question: What is the activity widget?
questions.answer: The activity widget helps you track various wellness activities and their impact on your overall health score.

questions.question: How do I export my data?
questions.answer: Go to Settings > Data Management > Export Health Data. This will create a JSON file with all your health events, metadata, and adjustments.

questions.question: Can I import data from another device?
questions.answer: Yes, use Settings > Data Management > Import Health Data to import a previously exported JSON file.
